program.name: Bikini Body Guide (BBG)
program.author: Kayla Itsines
program.description: 12-week resistance training program with 4 weeks pre-training

phases.name: Pre-Training
phases.description: Optional 4-week on-ramp for beginners, those new to resistance training, or returning to exercise after a break (including post-pregnancy with doctor's clearance).
phases.detail: Simpler exercises (e.g. knee push-ups instead of full push-ups), lower volume, and no heavy weights. Builds a foundation so you're ready for the main programme.

phases.name: Weeks 1–4
phases.description: Foundation block. Introduces weighted exercises and compound movements. Progressive overload starts here.
phases.detail: You'll start using dumbbells (3-6 kg) and a medicine ball (6-12 kg). The intensity increases compared to pre-training with more challenging variations.

phases.name: Weeks 5–8
phases.description: Intermediate block. Harder exercise variations, heavier weights, and more cardio sessions per week.
phases.detail: New exercises like decline push-ups, weighted sumo squats on bench (10-15 kg), and combo moves. Cardio increases to 3-4 LISS sessions per week.

phases.name: Weeks 9–12
phases.description: Advanced block. Maximum intensity with plyometrics, complex combos, and HIIT cardio added.
phases.detail: Includes bench jumps, burpee combos, spider push-ups, and bosu exercises. HIIT cardio (1-2 sessions) is added alongside LISS. This is the final push.
